Headline: 152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero and Addison due to, street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero and Addison due to, street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
